title: Will the legacy vault be open this Christmas?
body: Title. Just wondering because I wanted to gift some friends some neat skins.

replies.body: There are quite a few sales going on right now including some legacy skins, though it's not the entire vault.  Check out our [December Sales ](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/december-sales-schedule-1)for now, and keep an eye on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page should anything regarding the vault as a whole come up.
